description: Describes the IAM role that enables Amazon Inspector to access your AWS account.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that specifies the IAM role that Amazon Inspector uses to access your AWS account.

nested_items.name: valid
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the IAM role has the necessary policies attached to enable Amazon Inspector to access your AWS account.

nested_items.name: registeredAt
nested_items.description: The date when the cross-account access role was registered.
